Title: A Public Bug Database of GitHub Projects and Its Application in Bug Prediction
Published: Computional Science and Its Applications ICCSA 2016
UseOF-SZZ: They created a bug database to test SZZ, they used SZZ to map bugs and commits
Summary: They selected 15 Java projects from GitHub to construct a public bug database from. Also, they matched the already known and fixed bugs with the corresponding source code elements (classes and files) and calculated a wide set of product metrics on these elements.
Outcome: They calculated the bug coverage ratio on every project for every machine learning algorithm. They obtained very high and promising bug coverage values (up to 100 %).
